messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about SIM issues related to tax filing.
I filed my taxes but my SIM is still blocked. What do I do?
Why's my SIM still blocked after tax filing?
Filed taxes but SIM blocked, help?
If your SIM is still blocked despite filing your tax, contact the FBR and your service provider with proof of tax filing to resolve the issue.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about SIM issues related to tax filing.
How do I know if my SIM block is due to tax issues?
Signs my SIM is blocked for tax reasons?
Tax issue blocked my SIM, how to confirm?
You should receive a notification from your service provider before blocking.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about SIM issues related to tax filing.
Will all my SIMs be blocked if I don't file tax?
Do all SIMs get blocked for not filing tax?
If I miss tax filing, are all SIMs under my CNIC blocked?
Yes, all SIMs registered against your CNIC will be blocked if you fail to file your tax.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about SIM issues related to tax filing.
How can I unblock my SIM?
Steps to reactivate my blocked SIM?
Blocked SIM, how to unblock?
You will need to file your taxes to get your SIM unblocked or change ownership of the SIM from the closest Telenor Pakistan franchise to a filer CNIC.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about SIM issues related to tax filing.
What if I don't file my taxes?
What happens if taxes aren't filed?
Consequences of not filing tax?
Your number against your non-filer CNIC shall remain blocked till tax is not filed.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about SIM issues related to tax filing.
Can I use my SIM for emergencies if it's blocked?
Emergency calls with a blocked SIM, possible?
Blocked SIM, can I still make emergency calls?
No, all incoming and outgoing services are blocked. You can however call the Telenor helpline for further guidance (Charges Rs. 2.3+ tax per minute).
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about SIM issues related to tax filing.
How fast does my SIM get unblocked after I file my taxes?
After tax filing, how soon is SIM unblocked?
Timeline for SIM unblock post tax filing?
Your SIM will be unblocked as soon as FBR shares your filing confirmation with Telenor Pakistan.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about SIM issues related to tax filing.
What documents are needed to file my taxes?
Needed docs for tax filing?
Documents to prepare for tax filing?
You will need your CNIC, income details, bank statements, and any other relevant financial documents.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about SIM issues related to tax filing.
How can I file my taxes?
Steps to file my taxes online?
Tax filing process, how to start?
You can file your tax on FBR’s e-portal iris.fbr.gov.pk or call FBR helpline 051111772772 for further assistance.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about SIM issues related to tax filing.
How do I unblock my number after tax filing?
Steps to unblock my number post tax filing?
Unblock number after tax file, how?
Your number will be unblocked after you have filed the tax and Telenor Pakistan has received confirmation for unblocking your number from FBR.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about SIM issues related to tax filing.
Why is my number blocked?
Reason my number is blocked?
Why would they block my number?

As per the FBR records, it is indicated that you have not filed your taxes for Year 2023. On the directives of FBR, non-filer customers mobile numbers will be blocked till they don’t file their taxes.
